overview: Frank is our VP of Product Management and comes to us from Audience Science where he held executive roles in Product Management, Product Marketing and Privacy. But as they say in late night television commercials, thereâ€™s more, because Frank has had a spectacular career at Quarterdeck, Xircom, Intel and ValueClick. In his free time, Frank can be found on the basketball court, at a triathlon, or with his wife at a high school football game, cheering for their son (quarterback) and daughter (cheerleader). Frank holds a BA in Political Science as well as an MBA from UCLA. At BlueCava, Frank has been known to play the occasional office prank. Common decency prevents us from revealing what they were.
